title: Seaweed
summaries: Seaweed is a pet-summoning item which summons a Turtle pet that follows the player around. When the player is out of reach, the Turtle will fly using a propeller to catch up to the player. Seaweed has a 1/50 (2%) chance of being found in Ivy Chests, located in the Underground Jungle's Jungle Shrines or Living Mahogany Trees. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, it can also be obtained from Jungle Crates and Bramble Crates with a 1/20 (5%) chance.

statistics.Sell: 2 GC
